# GL Unified Charter Activated
# Phase Reports Archive

This directory contains archived phase completion reports that have been superseded or consolidated.

## Contents

Currently empty - all phase reports have been consolidated into the root-level summary files.

## Related Files

Active phase summaries are maintained in the root directory:
- `PHASES_COMPLETION_SUMMARY.md` - Combined phases completion summary
- `MCP-LEVEL3-PHASE*-COMPLETION-REPORT.md` - Individual phase completion reports
- `PHASE*-SUMMARY.md` - Phase summary files

For historical TODO files, see `archive/old-todos/`.
